Info1.Description: Spew napalm that slows enemy movement and amplifies the damage {s:hero_name} does to them.

Move forward at high speed and leave a flame trail that burns enemies. Infernus gains {s:SlowResistancePercent}% slow resistance for the duration.
Hold [{s:iv_attack}] to dash faster.
Your bullets build up to apply a burning effect on enemies. {s:hero_name}'s bullets and abilities will refresh the duration.
Turns you into a living bomb that explodes after a short delay, stunning all enemies in its radius.
Shoot a ball of lightning that travels in a straight line. Does damage to all targets in its radius. Slows down when damaging enemies and stops if it hits the world.
Apply a charge to a target enemy hero. After a short duration, the static charge stuns and damages enemies within the radius.
Power up your weapon with a shock effect, making your bullets proc shock damage on your target. This shock damage bounces to enemies near your target. Occurs once per burst shot.

Channel an expanding storm cloud around you that damages all enemies within its radius. Enemies do not take damage when they are out of line-of-sight. You have increased Bullet Resist during the channel.
Throw a stake that tethers enemies to the location where the stake lands. Enemy movement is restricted to the length of the tether.
Leap into the air and fly. While in flight your weapon deals bonus spirit damage.
Your crow familiar deals impact damage, reduces their bullet resist and applies a bleed that deals damage based on the target's current health.

Use your scoped rifle to fire a powerful shot over long distances. Deal only partial damage until fully charged after 1s of being scoped. Does bonus damage to enemies with less than {s:LowHealthEnemyThresholdPct}% health remaining. Landing a killing blow on a player with Assassinate grants you bonus souls.

Sacrifice some of your health to launch a bomb that deals damage after a brief arm time.
Self damage type is Spirit and can be mitigated.

Create a tether that drains enemy health over time and heals you. Target must be in line of sight and within max range to drain. You can shoot and use other abilities during the drain, but your movement speed is reduced by half. Press [{s:in_ability2}] to cancel.
Sacrifice some of your health to launch blood shards that apply a stack of Malice. Each stack slows the victim and increases the damage they take from you. The slow effect decreases over time.
Swaps health levels with an enemy target. There is a minimum health percentage that enemies can be brought down to and a minimum amount of health received based on victims current health.
Drain health from enemies in front of you while they are in the radius.
Charge forward, colliding with enemies and dragging them along. Hitting a wall will Stun enemies caught by {s:hero_name}. Speed increased after colliding with enemy Heroes.
Regenerate a portion of incoming damage over time.

Leap high into the air and choose a ground location to crash into. When you hit the ground, all enemies in the radius are damaged and stunned.
Press [{s:iv_attack}] to crash down early.
Deal weapon damage to summon cards.  Activate to throw a card that flies towards the enemy or point under your crosshair.
Teleport to the targeted location.
Temporarily boosts your fire rate. Nearby allies receive half the fire rate bonus.
Lift an enemy hero into the air, stunning them for a short time. When the lift ends, the target receives Telekinesis damage.
Deploy a spirit that heals nearby units.

Creates a wall that divides the terrain in half. On creation, the wall deals damage and applies slow to enemies nearby.
After casting, press [{s:iv_attack}] or [{s:in_ability3}] to erupt the wall early.
Unleashes a volley of rockets that home in on a targeted location.
Throw a grenade that begins pulsing when it lands. Each pulse applies damage, movement slow, and stacking damage amplification for {s:hero_name} against the victim.
Create a time warping wall that stops time for all enemy projectiles and bullets that touch it. Enemies that touch the wall will take damage as a percentage of their max health and be briefly slowed.

Start charging your weapon and gain increased movement speed once it's fully charged. Your next shot will release the energy, dealing spirit damage and applying a time stop to the enemy hit. The damage dealt is an amplification of your current weapon damage.

You can slow time on yourself by pressing [{s:iv_attack2}] while an empowered shot is available.
Fire a projectile that swaps your position with the target enemy hero. While the effect occurs, you gain spirit lifesteal and the enemy takes damage over time.
Release an energy pulse that knocks enemies up into the air.

{s:hero_name} briefly disappears into the void and then reappears a short distance away. On reappearing, your weapon is reloaded and has a fire rate bonus for the next clip (Max {s:FireRateBonusDurationMax}s). Can be cast with [{s:key_alt_cast}] to also bring nearby allies and give them half fire rate bonus.
While channelling, restore health over time to you and any allies nearby. Dashing does not break channel.
Create a singularity in your hands that pulls in nearby enemies and damages them. Once it's finished, enemies get knocked into the air.
Throw a grenade that explodes in a cloud of freezing ice, damaging and slowing enemies.

{s:hero_name} creates a floating trail of ice and snow that gives movement bonuses to him and his allies. Kelvin gains {s:SlowResistancePercent}% slow resistance for the duration. Enemies can also walk on the floating trail.
Press [{s:key_innate_1}] / [{s:key_duck}] to travel up or down while in Ice Path.

Shoot freezing cold energy out in front of you, damaging targets and building up movement and fire rate slow against them the longer you sustain the beam on them. You have reduced movement speed while using Arctic Beam. The beam may also claim Souls.
{s:hero_name} freezes the air around him, creating an impenetrable dome around himself. While in the dome, allies rapidly regenerate health and enemies are slowed.

Throw a dagger that damages and sleeps the target. Sleeping targets wake up shortly after being damaged. Throwing a Dagger does not break your invisibility. Sleep Dagger does not interrupt enemies' channeling abilities.
Fade out of sight, becoming invisible and gaining sprint speed. Attacking removes invisibility. Close enemies can see through your invisibility.
Shooting a target increases your bullet damage on that target. Gain one stack per bullet hit, two if the hit is a headshot.
Enter a flurry, firing your weapon at nearby enemies with perfect accuracy. During the flurry, {s:hero_name} gains a fire rate bonus and will evade some of the bullets shot at her.
Place a barrel that explodes when shot, or on landing after launched via melee attack or bounce pad. Has a minimum arm time before it can explode.
Drop a bounce pad in the world that sends you and other heroes flying. You will stomp down on landing, dealing damage to any nearby enemies.
Throws out her hat to strike enemies, slowing and revealing them through walls.

Grab an enemy with your lasso and drag them along behind you. The enemy is stunned and Astro is slowed slightly during the lasso.

Lasso duration is paused for {s:BouncePadExtendDuration}s during the first usage of a bounce pad.
Deal Light Melee damage to nearby units and send them flying back, causing area damage where they land. Does not damage allies.

Attach a Sticky Bomb to a nearby target that deals explosive damage after a short fuse time.
Gain +{s:BonusDamagePctPerPlayerHit}% bomb damage for every enemy hero hit.
Hold [{s:key_alt_cast}] to cast a Sticky Bomb on yourself.
Launch out a hook that grabs and reels in the first hero it hits and deals damage to enemies. Target will be placed where you are facing.

Send a Spirit Cat forward that grab's targets in its way. Grabbing a Hero will cause an explosion soon after.
Press [{s:in_ability1}] to manually create the explosion.
Leap at a target to inflict Light Melee damage. Targetting an enemy will cause slow on nearby enemies. Targeting an ally will have reduced Cooldown and Recharge times.

Send out Ava to attack a nearby enemy. Targetted enemies have reduced healing and give health to Ava and {s:hero_name} when damanged by them. Ava is only active when {s:hero_name} is nearby.
While nearby Press [3] to recall Ava, Ava regains health while recalled.
Cast yourself in shadow and go Invisible. Attacks do not break invisibility but they will temporarily reveal you. Hitting enemies with Melee damage will reduce their bullet resist (stacking)
Charge up a powerful shot that pierces through enemies. Hold [{s:ability_key}] or [{s:iv_attack}] to hold the shot.
Launches you high in the air, allowing you to glide slowly. While airborne, you gain Weapon Damage and multishot on your weapon. Press [{s:in_mantle}] to cancel the glide.
Throw out a trap that begins to arm itself. Once armed, the trap will trigger when an enemy enters its radius, immobilizing and then slowing them.

After {s:AbilityCastDelay}s cast time, launch a spirit owl that you control and which explodes on impact, damaging and stunning enemies. Hold [{s:iv_attack}] to accelerate the owl.
Press [{s:in_mantle}] to release control. Gain permanent Spirit Power for each enemy hero killed with Guided Owl.
Deal damage to nearby enemies and heal yourself based on the damage done. Heal is stronger against enemy heroes.

Burrow underground, moving faster, and gaining spirit and bullet armor. Damage from enemy heroes will reduce the speed bonus. When you jump out, knock enemies into the air and perform a spin attack that damages and slows. Cooldown starts when Burrow ends.
Spray sand that disarms enemies in front of you and deals damage.
Hold the target in place, stunning them and dealing damage during the channel. If they die during Combo, you permanently gain max health.
Throw a knife that damages and bleeds an enemy. Each additional hit adds a stack and refreshes the bleed duration, causing the bleed to increase per stack.

Info2.Description: Ultimate Unlock: While rage is full knives will ricochet to another enemy and apply a slow to enemies they bleed.

Info1.Description:
Perform a dash forward, damaging enemies along the path.

Ultimate Unlock: While rage is full an echo of Shiv retraces the dash path after a short delay, damaging enemies again.
Activate to leap towards an enemy hero and instantly kill them if their health is below the kill threshold, otherwise deal {s:Damage} damage to them.

Info2.Description: Passive: Damaging enemies fills you with rage. While at full rage, Shiv gains increased damage and special properties on his other abilities.

Info1.Description: Summon a patch of choking vines that damages and slows enemies in its radius.

Gain bonuses and automatically connect with a nearby ally to share them. Healing is replicated among all those connected. Connection requires line of sight. Press [{s:in_ability2}] to Lock on to a target
Turn yourself into impervious stone and smash into the ground, stunning and damaging enemies nearby. Heals you for a percentage of your max health. You have some air control before falling.

Take flight with an ally or a bomb. Drop your ally or bomb to cause a large explosion that causes movement slow. {s:hero_name} and ally gain a bullet shield when flying ends.
While lifted, your ally gains bullet resist but cannot attack and deals {s:AllyOutgoingDamagePercent}% damage. Air Drop has faster cast time when targeting an ally.
[{s:iv_attack}] to accelerate flying speed.
[{s:iv_attack2}] to drop ally/bomb.
Throw a flask that damages, slows, and reduces the weapon damage and stamina of enemies it hits.
Gain a spirit shield and bonus movement speed.
Curse an enemy hero. If they don't move away from their initial position within the escape time, they will be damaged and immobilized.

After charging for {s:AbilityCastDelay}s, release pulses that damage enemies and heal you based on the damage done.
While channeling Last Stand you have greatly increased bullet resist.

Channel to increase damage over {s:AbilityCastDelay} seconds, then release a fully-charged sword strike.
Press [{s:in_ability1}] or [{s:iv_attack}] to trigger the strike early, dealing partial damage.
Throw a grappling hook to reel yourself towards an enemy, damaging and slowing the target when you arrive.
Slash enemies in front of you, damaging them and slowing their fire rate. If any enemy heroes are hit, you heal.

Become infused with Yamato's shadow soul. After an initial invincible transformation, your abilities are refreshed and are 60% faster, your weapon has infinite ammo, and you gain damage resists and immunity to negative status effects. You are unable to die in this mode.
Stomp the ground beneath you, damaging enemies in front of you. If you perform Ground Strike while airborne, you quickly dive towards the ground. Damage grows slower after 25m.
Pull yourself through the air toward a target. Using Grapple also resets your limit of air jumps and dashes.
Strike enemies with your whip, stealing life from them.

Focus on enemies to connect whips to them. After channeling, connected enemies are lifted and stunned then slammed into the ground. Your victims and any enemies in the landing zone will be damaged and slowed.
Press [{s:iv_attack}] to throw connected enemies early. Enemies that are not in line of sight or go out of range during the latch time will not be grabbed.
Throw a ball of goo that deals damage and leaves puddles of goo behind that apply movement slow to enemies in the radius.

Encase the target in a cube of restorative goo that purges debuffs, protects from damage, and increases health regen. Target is unable to take any new actions while cubed. Can be used on self. Press [{s:in_mantle}] to escape early.

Materialize a fist in the world that punches units in the area and send them flying. Enemies will be dealt damage, have their dash distance reduced for a brief moment, and have their movement slowed. This is considered a Light Melee attack.
Morph into a large goo ball that deals damage and stuns enemies on impact. The ball grants large amounts of Bullet and Spirit resist, bounces off walls and can double jump.
Create a large ball of scrap that can be thrown, damaging and stunning anything it hits. The ball takes time to create and you move slower while carrying it.
Stuns an enemy trooper or NPC, damaging them while held. A successful kill provides a fire rate bonus, and restores a Bio Blast charge. This bonus stacks independently
Shoots out a blast of consumed remains, damaging and slowing enemies. Multiple hits increase the slow.
Launch a flying shadow copy of yourself that you control, teleporting your original body to wherever it lands. The teleport explosion slows enemies and deals damage based on how long you were flying.

Channel to start launching projectiles that deal damage and apply movement slow around their impact point. Each projectile landed on a hero grants you a stacking buff that amplifies all of your damage.
If you cast it while in the air, you'll float and maintain any horizontal momentum you started with.
Launch a sentient cloak that travels forward and damages enemies. You can press [{s:in_ability2}] to teleport to its location.
Escape into your suitcase. When the duration ends, deal damage to nearby enemies. Duration can be ended early by performing any action.

Apply damage over time to all enemies nearby.
Affliction's damage is non-lethal and does not apply item procs.
Send out a tornado that damages enemies and lifts them up in the air. While they're up in the air, targets will fully evade all bullets.
Start launching fire scarabs. Each scarab can be launched separately, applying a lifesteal over time to enemies they hit. Once the launch window ends, this ability goes on cooldown.
Passive: Your next shot is amplified with Spirit Damage. Each amplified shot that hits the same target increases the Spirit Damage dealt.

Info2.Description: You become enveloped in a whirlwind that provides bullet evasion and movement speed.

Info1.Description: Launch a slow projectile that you can activate anywhere along its path to detonate it, dealing damage to enemies caught in its radius. Deals bonus damage for each additional hero hit.
